casebody.data:
Bryan CONNOLLY and Susan Connolly, Individually and as Co-Administrators of the Estate of Ethan P. Connolly, Plaintiffs Below, Appellants,
v.
ALPHA EPSILON PHI SORORITY, Individually and t/a Phi Chi Chapter, Defendants Below, Appellees. No. 152, 2018 Supreme Court of Delaware.

Submitted: November 28, 2018
Decided: December 12, 2018
Reargument Denied December 17, 2018

AFFIRMED.
